verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%>, you <S%H6510>cows<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, that are in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, which <S%H6231>oppress<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, which <S%H7533>crush<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%>, which <S%H559>say<s%> to their <S%H113>masters<s%>, <S%H935>Bring<s%>, and let us <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

<S%H935>Come<s%> to <S%H1008>Beth<s%>â€“el, and <S%H6586>transgress<s%>; at <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H6586>transgression<s%>; and <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and your <S%H4643>tithes<s%> after <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>years<s%>:

And <S%H6999>offer<s%> a sacrifice of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> with <S%H2557>yeast<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> the free <S%H5071>offerings<s%>: for this <S%H3651>you<s%> <S%H157>like<s%>, O you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

And I also have <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H5356>cleanness<s%> of <S%H8127>teeth<s%> in all your <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and <S%H2640>want<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in all your <S%H4725>places<s%>: yet have you not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H5002>me<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And also I have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> the <S%H1653>rain<s%> from <S%H7969>you<s%>, when there were yet three <S%H2320>months<s%> to the <S%H7105>harvest<s%>: and I caused it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> upon <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and caused it not to <S%H4305>rain<s%> upon <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>: <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2513>piece<s%> was <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H2513>upon<s%>, and the piece whereupon it <S%H4305>rained<s%> not <S%H3001>withered<s%>.

Therefore thus will I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H3478>you<s%>, O Israel: and <S%H6118>because<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> this unto <S%H3559>you<s%>, prepare to <S%H7125>meet<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H3335>For<s%>, behold, he that forms the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and <S%H1254>creates<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, and <S%H5046>declares<s%> unto <S%H120>man<s%> what is his <S%H7808>thought<s%>, that <S%H6213>makes<s%> the <S%H7837>morning<s%> <S%H5890>darkness<s%>, and <S%H1869>treads<s%> upon the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.
